Polypropylene Sheets and Rods

Polypropylene (PP) is light, strong and has resistance to chemicals and has a low friction surface, all of which make it ideal as a replacement for wood or metal which are the materials traditionally used.

Click below to download catalogue

HDPE - Polyethylene Sheets & Rods

High Density Polyethylene Rod (HDPE) is a FDA Approved material of the highest quality with excellent impact resistance. HDPE has high tensile strength, low moisture absorption and is chemical and corrosion resistant.

Click below to download catalogue

UHMW - PE Sheets and Rods

UHMW-PE (ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene) sheets are a type of plastic known for its extremely high wear and abrasion resistance. It is self-lubricating, has a low coefficient of friction, and is resistant to chemicals and moisture.

Click below to download catalogue

Polyoxymethylene / Polyacetal

Polyacetal (POM) sheets and rods are among the strongest and stiffest of all thermoplastics. Plastic materials are characterized by good fatigue life, low moisture sensitivity, and high resistance to solvents and chemicals.

Acrylic-PMMA Tubes

Acrylic tubes are hollow cylindrical products made from polymethyl methacrylate (PMMA) — a type of transparent thermoplastic often used as a lightweight and shatter-resistant alternative to glass.

Click below to download catalogue

Polycarbonate Solid Sheet & Roll

Solid Polycarbonate Sheets offer a wide range of properties that make them superior to other thermoplastic sheets or products and the material of choice for high performance roofing applications, glazing and fabricated solutions.

Polycarbonate Multiwall Sheet

Multiwall Polycarbonate Sheets are a highly engineered and evolved products, making them extremely versatile and perfectly suited to a very wide range of end-uses. The advantageous weight to performance ratio, ensures that Multiwall Sheets deliver excellent results.

Polycarbonate Profile Sheet

Chennai Polyplast profiled polycarbonate sheets fall under 2 basic categories. They are Extruded Polycarbonate Profile Sheets and Cold Profiled Polycarbonate Sheets. Extruded Polycarbonate Profile Sheets are given their distinctive shapes or profiles at the time of being manufactured.

PA6-Polyamide Sheets and Rods

PA sheet and rod is a thermoplastic sheet extruded from polyamide (Nylon) PA6. It has high mechanical strength, wear resistance, easy processing, and good creep resistance and mechanical shock absorption.

PEEK-Polyether Ether Ketone

PEEK - Polyetheretherketone is a semi-crystalline thermoplastic with excellent dimensional stability and flame retardant properties. It offers very high resistance to high-energy radiation and chemicals.

PEI-Polyetherimide

PEI - Polyetherimide is an amorphous thermoplastic known for its extremely high flame resistance and very low smoke development. It provides superior stiffness and tensile strength over broad ranges.

Phenolic Fabric Sheets & Rods

Phenolic Fabric Sheets & Rods are high-strength, wear-resistant, and electrically insulating composite materials made by impregnating layers of cotton fabric with phenolic resin under high pressure.

Click below to download catalogue

Phenolic Paper Sheets

Phenolic Paper Sheets & Rods are cost-effective, rigid, and electrically insulating thermoset laminates produced by impregnating high-quality cellulose paper with phenolic resin under heat and pressure.

Click below to download catalogue

Bakelite Sheets

Bakelite (Phenolic Laminates) is one of the earliest thermosetting plastics ever invented. It is manufactured by impregnating layers of paper or fabric with phenolic resin and curing them under heat.

Click below to download catalogue

Syndanio Sheets

Syndanio is a cement-and-fiber composite insulation material, manufactured in rigid sheets and rods. It offers high mechanical strength, low thermal conductivity, and durability under industrial condition.

Click below to download catalogue

PTFE Sheet

PTFE Sheet offers low temperature and high temperature resistance (-180°C~+260°C), corrosion resistance, and weather resistance. It has high lubricity, no adhesion, and is non-toxic and non-flammable.

Click below to download catalogue

Polyurethane - PU

Cast Polyurethanes are cost-effective elastomers combining the advantages of plastics, metals, and ceramics with rubber's flexibility. They offer high load capacity, impact strength, abrasion resistance.

Epoxy Glass Cloth Laminated Sheets

Chennai Polyplast provides Glass Epoxy Sheets tailored for demanding industrial needs. Known for superior electrical insulation, robust mechanical strength, and chemical resistance, these sheets offer thermal stability.

ESD PRODUCTS

Electrostatic Discharge (ESD) safe materials are designed to dissipate static charges safely, preventing equipment failure and production losses. Includes ESD Acrylic and ESD Polycarbonate sheets.

Precision-engineered CNC machined plastic components manufactured to meet tight tolerances, complex geometries, and demanding industrial applications. Features high dimensional accuracy and finish.

Silicone Rubber

Silicone Rubber is a high-performance synthetic elastomer with exceptional thermal stability and flexibility. It is resistant to aging, UV, and chemicals, ideal for industrial and food-safe apps.
